snippet: The Carpetbagger is back, ready to sort out the hopefuls from the wannabes, the campaigns from the backlashes.
abstract: The Carpetbagger is back, ready to sort out the hopefuls from the wannabes, the campaigns from the backlashes.
lead_paragraph: Welcome back, film fans, award prognosticators and armchair observers of celebrity schadenfreude.

headline.main: Awards Season, How We’ve Missed You
